Using build

Got this exception while trying to update from the AJDT site 
(http://download.eclipse.org/technology/ajdt/30M8/update), I believe.

Got a dialog reporting the timeout with an option to retry so everything seemed 
to be ok and after many retries, I finally got the complete update. Not sure if 
the stack trace should be polluting the log though if the timeout is handled 
correctly.

I think you've accidentally opened the same bug three times (unless you did it 
intentionally so we take it seriously :-)
